participant_1.background:
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
my favorite band is ween.
i am under 6 feet tall.
My family and I work hard on our farm.
i am a older lady.

participant_2.background:
I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars.
i want to get married again.
my mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
my name is arnold.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you! And you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am a fan of Ween. What about you?
I have heard of them, but I have not listened to them much. What do you like about them?
I like their music and their sense of humor. What do you do for work?
I am a scientist and I am working on a project to go to Mars.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to go to Mars. What is your favorite thing about your job?
I love the research and the challenge of trying to figure out how to get to Mars. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
That is so cool! I have never met a celebrity before. What is your favorite autograph you have ever gotten?
My favorite autograph is from Gene Ween. He is my favorite member of the band.
That is so cool! I have never heard of them before, but I will have to check them out.
